name: Quicker Font Switcher
description:
Switch quickly between fonts you're already using in your document — no more reaching for the mouse.

When run, it will show you a list of fonts you're using in your document or current page. Use the keyboard to move up and down and press Return to apply to selected text nodes. Check "Leave Open" to have a handy font palette floating around to apply fonts in a snap.

Feedback welcome!
